---

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required items (e.g., iron ore) in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. Repeated attempts to insert without sufficient items waste steps and cause errors.

#### Errors when furnaces run out of fuel
- Regularly check and refuel furnaces and mining drills with coal to avoid interruptions in production. For example, the burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) is out of fuel and not operational.

#### Errors when furnaces lack ingredients
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and the required ingredients (e.g., iron ore) to operate. Multiple furnaces are currently idle due to a lack of iron ore.

#### General Tips
- Monitor the status of entities (e.g., furnaces, mining drills) to identify and resolve issues such as lack of fuel or ingredients promptly.
- Use inserters effectively to automate item transfer between entities, reducing manual intervention and errors.
